vicitra ratna arciḥ mālā chatra samudra meghaiḥ
samanta ratna reṇu prabhāsa pratimaṇḍita ghaṇṭā jāla avalaṃbita chatra samudra meghaiḥ
sarva maṇi druma śāka alaṃkāra chatra samudra meghaiḥ
sūrya virocana arciḥ maṇi rāja sarva gandha dhūpa chatra samudra meghaiḥ
candana cūrṇakośa samanta spharaṇa chatra samudra meghaiḥ
vipula buddha viṣaya vidyotita samanta vyūha spharaṇa chatra samudra meghaiḥ

original: asaṃbhinnaiḥ sarva-buddha-bodhisattva-samudrān satkuryāmo gurukuryāmo mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ |
analyzed: a saṃbhinnaiḥ sarva buddha bodhisattva samudrān satkuryāmaḥ gurukuryāmaḥ mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ
sarva ratna avabhāsa maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ

kusuma megha vidyotita prabhā maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ

sarva buddhakṣetra pratibhāsa antargata prabhā maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
samanta mukha buddha viṣaya nigarjana ratna śākhā prabhā maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
sarva vaidūrya ratna gotra maṇi rājaraśmi prabhā maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
ananta sattva rūpa citta kṣaṇa saṃdarśana prabhā maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
sarva buddha praṇidhāna saṃbhava manojña nāda pramuñcana prabhā maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
sarva parṣad maṇḍala sattva vinaya nirghoṣa maṇi rāja prabhā maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
sarva buddha bodhisattva samudrān satkuryāmaḥ gurukuryāmaḥ mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ
sarva maṇi kośa raśmi samudra meghaiḥ
sarva buddha rūpa śabda gandha rasa spraṣṭavya raśmi samudra meghaiḥ
sarva ratna arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
sarva buddha dharma nigarjana spharaṇa raśmi samudra meghaiḥ
sarva buddhakṣetra vyūha vidyotita raśmi samudra meghaiḥ
sarva puṣpa kūṭāgāra raśmi samudra meghaiḥ
sarva ratna reṇu raśmi samudra meghaiḥ
sarva kalpa paraṃparā buddha saṃbhava sattva paripācana nigarjana raśmi samudra meghaiḥ
akṣaya sattva ratna nidarśana sarva puṣpa keśara raśmi samudra meghaiḥ

original: sarvāsana-vyūha-saṃdarśana-raśmi-samudra-meghaiḥ asaṃbhinnaiḥ sarva-buddha-bodhisattva-samudrān satkuryāmo gurukuryāmo mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ

a saṃbhinnaiḥ ananta varṇa ratna arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
vipula sarva buddhakṣetra vyūha vidyotita arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
sarva gandha arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
sarva vyūha arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
sarva buddha nirmāṇa arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
vicitra ratna druma keśara arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
sarva vastra arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
sarva muktā pradipa arciḥ samudra meghaiḥ
a saṃbhinnaiḥ sarva buddha bodhisattva sāgara megha samudrān satkuryāmaḥ gurukuryāmaḥ mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ
acintyaiḥ sarva gandha puṣpa vicitra samudra meghaiḥ
sarva ratna arciḥ padma jāla samudra meghaiḥ
ananta varṇa maṇi ratna prabhāḥ maṇḍala samudra meghaiḥ
sarva ratna varṇa muktā kośa samudra meghaiḥ
sarva ratna gandha candana curṇa samudra meghaiḥ
sarva ratna chatra samudra meghaiḥ
manojña śubha ruta svarṇa keśara raśmi jyotiḥ dhvaja vitāna samudra meghaiḥ
acintya vyūha pratibhāsa prabhā sarva vyūha alaṃkāra samudra meghaiḥ
manojña śubha rucira nirghoṣa maṇi rāja samudra meghaiḥ
sūrya jyotiḥ maṇi cakra hāra samudra meghaiḥ

sarva samata bhadra ātmabhāva samudra meghaiḥ
a saṃbhinnaiḥ sarva buddha bodhisattva sāgara megha samudrān satkuryāmaḥ gurukuryāmaḥ mānayemaḥ pūjayemaḥ

original: evam rūpaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā te nāga-rājānaḥ punar api bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇikṛtya pādābhivadanāñ ca kṛtvā,
analyzed: evam rūpam praṇidhānam kṛtvā te nāga rājānaḥ punar api bhagavantam tris pradakṣiṇikṛtya pāda abhivadanām ca kṛtvā
bhagavatā anujñatāḥ sveṣu svastha āsaneṣu nyaṣīdan

original: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ananta-parikala-sāgala-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājas tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatiḥ avaivartika-praṇidhāna-parikarmair  #
analyzed: tena khalu punar samayena ananta parikala sāgala megha vyūha tejaḥ maṇḍala chatra ākāra rājaḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasrikaḥ mahā nāga adhipatiḥ a vaivartika praṇidhāna parikarmaiḥ

original: jambudvīpe 'tyāgatas tathāgatasya pūjanāyai vandanāyai paryupāsanāyai dharma-śravaṇāyai ca |
analyzed: jambudvīpe tyāgataḥ tathāgatasya pūjanāyai vandanāyai paryupāsanāyai dharma śravaṇāyai ca

original: atha khalv ananta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājas tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatiḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃśam  #
analyzed: atha khalu ananta parikara sāgara megha vyūha tejaḥ maṇḍala chatra ākāra rājaḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasrikaḥ mahā nāga adhipatiḥ utthāya āsanāt eka aṃśam  /

original: uttarā-saṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇam jānu-maṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat |
analyzed: uttarāsaṅgam kṛtvā dakṣiṇam jānu maṇḍalam pṛthivyām pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavān tena añjalim praṇamya bhagavantam etat avocat

original: pṛccheyam ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksambuddhaṃ kiñcid eva pradeśa-praśnaṃ sacen me bhagavān avakāśaṃ kuryāt pṛṣṭaḥ praśna-vyākaraṇāya
analyzed: pṛccheyam aham bhagavantam tathāgatam arhantam samyaksambuddham kiñcid eva pradeśa praśnam saced me bhagavān avakāśam kuryāt pṛṣṭaḥ praśna vyākaraṇāya

original: evam ukte bhagavān ananta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājaṃ nāgādhipatim etad avocat |
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān ananta parikara sāgara megha vyūha tejaḥ maṇḍala chatra ākāra rājam nāga adhipatim etat avocat

original: pṛccha tvaṃ bhujaṅgādhipate yad yad evākāṅkṣasy ahaṃ te,
analyzed: pṛccha tvam bhujaṅga adhipate yat yat eva ākāṅkṣasi aham te
tasya tasya eva praśna vyākaraṇena cittam ārādhayiṣye

original: evam ukte 'nanta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejo-maṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājas tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatir bhagavantam etad avocat
analyzed: evam ukte nanta parikara sāgara megha vyūha tejaḥ maṇḍala chatra ākāra rājaḥ tri sāhasra mahā sāhasrikaḥ mahā nāga adhipatiḥ bhagavantam etat avocat
katam bhagavan sarva nāgānām sarva nāga duḥkāni

original: praharṣitāḥ sukha-samanvitāś ceha jambu-dvīpe kālānukālaṃ varṣa-dhārā utsṛjeyuḥ,
analyzed: praharṣitāḥ sukha samanvitāḥ ca iha jambudvīpe kāla anukālam varṣa dhārāḥ utsṛjeyuḥ
sarva tṛṇa gulma oṣadhi vanaspatīn virohayeyuḥ
sarva śasyāni utpādayeyuḥ
sarva rasān saṃjanayeyuḥ
yena jaṃbudvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ sukha samarpitāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: evam ukte bhagavān ananta-parikara-sāgara-megha-vyūha-tejomaṇḍala-chatrākāra-rājaṃ tri-sāhasra-mahā-sāhasriko mahā-nāgādhipatim etad avocat
analyzed: evam ukte bhagavān ananta parikara sāgara megha vyūha tejaḥ maṇḍala chatra ākāra rājam tri sāhasra mahā sāhasrikaḥ mahā nāga adhipatim etat avocat

original: sādhu sādhu bhujaṅgādhipate yat tvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ hita-sukhāya pratipannaḥ tathāgatam etad arthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ manyase |
analyzed: sādhu sādhu bhujaṅga adhipate yat tvam sarva sattvānām hita sukhāya pratipannaḥ tathāgatam etat artham paripraṣṭavyam manyase

original: tena hi bhujaṅgādhipate śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye 'han te |
analyzed: tena hi bhujaṅga adhipate śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru bhāṣiṣye han te

original: eka-dharmena bhujaṅgādhipate samanvāgatānāṃ sarva-nāgānāṃ sarva-duḥkhāni praśraṃbhyeyuḥ,
analyzed: eka dharmena bhujaṅga adhipate samanvāgatānām sarva nāgānām sarva duḥkhāni praśraṃbhyeyuḥ
sukha samarpitāḥ ca bhaveyuḥ
katamena eka dharmeṇa

original: yaduta maitryā tatra bhujaṅgādhipate maitrī-vihāriṇo deva-manusyāḥ,
analyzed: yat uta maitryā tatra bhujaṅga adhipate maitrī vihāriṇaḥ
agninā na dahyante
śastreṇa na kṣaṇyante
udakena na uhyante
viṣeṇa na hanyante
para cakreṇa na abhibhūyante
sukham svapyanti
sukham ca pratibuddhyante
sva puṇya parirakṣitāḥ ca bhavanti
mahā puṇya tejaḥ tejitāḥ
an avamardanīyāḥ ca bhavanti
sa devakena lokena prasādikāḥ ca bhavanti
priya darśanāḥ ca sarvatra apratihata gatayaḥ ca bhavanti
sarva duḥkha pratipraśrabdhāḥ saṃpraharṣitāḥ ca bhavanti

original: sarva-sukha-samarpitāḥ uttare ca manuṣya-dharma-pratividhya-kāyasya bhedād brahma-loke upapadyante |
analyzed: sarva sukha samarpitāḥ uttare ca manuṣya dharma pratividhya kāyasya bhedāt brahma loke upapadyante
ete bhujaṅga adhipate anuśaṃsāḥ maitrī vihāriṇām deva manuṣyānām

original: tasmāt tarhi bhujaṅgādhipate maitreṇa kāya-karmaṇā maitreṇa vāk-karmaṇā maitreṇa manas-karmaṇā vihartavyaṃ |
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi bhujaṅga adhipate maitreṇa kāya karmaṇā maitreṇa vāc karmaṇā maitreṇa manaḥ karmaṇā vihartavyam
punar aparam bhujaṅga adhipate sarva sukhaṃ dadānā amadhāraṇī pravarttayitavyā

original: sā sarva-nāgānāṃ sarva-nāga-duḥkhāni pratiprasrambhyati sarva-sukhāni ca dadāti,
analyzed: sā sarva nāgānām sarva nāga duḥkhāni sarva sukhāni ca dadāti

original: yeneha jambudvīpe kālena kālaṃ varṣa-dhārā utsṛjati,
analyzed: yena iha jambudvīpe kālena kālam varṣa dhārāḥ utsṛjati
sarvatṛna gulma oṣadhi vanaspati śasyāni ca virohayanti
tatra bhujaṅga adhipate katamā sā sarva sukhaṃdadānā āmadhāraṇī

original: tadyathā, dhāraṇi dhāraṇi uttāraṇi saṃpratiṣṭhitā vijaya-varṇa satyapratijñā sahā-jñānavati utpādani vināśani abhiṣecani abhivyāhāraśubhāvati  #
analyzed: tat yathā dhāraṇi dhāraṇi uttāraṇi saṃpratiṣṭhitā vijayavarṇa satyapratijñā sahājñānavati utpādani vināśani abhiṣecani abhivyāhāra śubhāvati  /
ajīmatāmahi kumbāla nivāhā
hara kleśān
dhunu pāpam
śodhaya mārgān
nirīhaka dharma tā
śuddha āloka
vitimirārajasa
duḥkha śamana
sarva buddha avalokana adhiṣṭhite
saha a prajñā
jñāna ābhe svāhā

original: imāni tāni bhujaṅgādhipate dhāraṇī-mantra-padāni dhārayitavyāni parivarttayitavyāni sarva-sādhanāni dharma-praveśanāni sarvabuddhādhiṣṭhitāni  #
analyzed: imāni tāni bhujaṅga adhipate dhāraṇī mantra padāni dhārayitavyāni parivarttayitavyāni sarva sādhanāni dharma praveśanāni sarva buddha dhiṣṭhitāni
sarva sukha pradānāni
